content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs me, I previously cloned a repository from GitHub using the URL https://github.com/scikit-learn/scikit-learn.git and the clone path /home/atlas/autogpt/auto_gpt_workspace/scikit-learn. I also received a command to generate an image using Matplotlib, which was successful, but encountered an error when trying to tweet about it. I analyzed a code that was subtracting instead of adding numbers and received a command to execute a Python file called "my_script.py", but it did not exist. In the latest development, I attempted to list files in the scikit-learn directory but received an error due to too much output. I then attempted to read a file in the same directory.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'your computer', 'content': 'Failure: command read_file returned too much output.                         Do not execute this command again with the same arguments.'}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "write_to_file", "args": {"filename": "my_script.py", "text": "print(\'Hello, world!\')"}}}'}, {'role': 'your computer', 'content': 'Command write_to_file returned: File written to successfully.'}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "execute_python_file", "args": {"filename": "my_script.py"}}}'}]
